name: Hivemind (Brady Muth Audio)
description:
CONTROLS:

MOVE: W S A D

JUMP/HOVER: SPACEBAR/HOLD SPACEBAR

SHOOT: LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

SWITCH WEAPONS: 1 2 3

An army of robot bees have made their way into your hive! Fight them off and find out who is behind this attack! 

Make use of your new arsenal to repel this robot invasion!

[Bee Buster] - A quick firing stinger launcher, simple yet trusty

[Pollenizer] - A lever-action shotgun flower, putting the PETALS to the METAL

[Honey Cannon] - Needs no introduction

Credit:
